topic.title: Add a filter to a chart

section.title: Add a filter to a chart
section.p: You can filter a chart in two ways:

li.p: Click the legend labels to toggle the values on or off.
Follow the steps shown here to filter on the axis values.

section.p: To add a filter from the chart axes:

li.p: While viewing your answer as a chart, click the chart axis you want to filter on, and select Filter....

fig.title: Choose filter from a chart axis

li.p: Select the values you would like to include in your answer.
If you want to exclude values, click Exclude and choose values to exclude.

section.p: If there are too many values, you can use the filter search bar to find the ones you want.
